DOC.brief_summary: The present study is to examine the effects of a virtual reality based balance training using the Kinect sensor on postural stability and functional balance in individuals with Parkinson's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Virtual Reality Based Training on Posture Stability in Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: Hoehn and Yahr stages I through III A score of more than or equal to 24 on the minimental state examination Stable medication usage Freedom from any other problems that might affect training Unstable medical conditions Histories of other diseases known to interfere with participation in the study
